ROOT:
-- DaoM_Workflow_S3_Update -- 2014/7/18 日立 太郎 UPDATE [M_Workflow] SET
[Id] = @Set_Id_forUPD, [SubSystemId] = @Set_SubSystemId_forUPD, [WorkflowName] = @Set_WorkflowName_forUPD, [WfPositionId] = @Set_WfPositionId_forUPD, [WorkflowNo] = @Set_WorkflowNo_forUPD, [FromUserId] = @Set_FromUserId_forUPD, [ActionType] = @Set_ActionType_forUPD, [ToUserId] = @Set_ToUserId_forUPD, [ToUserPositionTitlesId] = @Set_ToUserPositionTitlesId_forUPD, [NextWfPositionId] = @Set_NextWfPositionId_forUPD, [NextWorkflowNo] = @Set_NextWorkflowNo_forUPD, [CorrespondOfReplyWorkflow] = @Set_CorrespondOfReplyWorkflow_forUPD, [MailTemplateId] = @Set_MailTemplateId_forUPD, [ReserveArea] = @Set_ReserveArea_forUPD,
WHERE [Id] = @Id
